name: Musical Chairs: DnB Edition
description:
Musical Chairs: DnB Edition 0.9

Made for Music Game Jam 2018

*** This is still a WIP ... I got food poisoning and lost a bunch of time coding so the game isn't complete. I'm hoping to do some more with it tomorrow (post submission).

Game Play

Keep walking around the chairs until the music stops! When it does, race for the chairs.

Why should you walk in a circle around the chairs? Because you need to pop the balloons before they do, otherwise you lose.

Controls

WASD / Gamepad - Player Movement

Coding and Music by Sikosis - http://games.sikosis.com/
